page.title: 12SANDOWN-4
page.content: They also have a{ROYALTY}chart which shows where a member of royalty is going and where to send a plane if necessary. The 1980's could mark a drastic change at Sandown airport. Some people think that they should expand the airport so that large passenger planes carrying tourists can land there. Others are against this plan because the airport is right next to a school and a new housing estate. They think that the planes going overhead could be very noisy and they could cause a very bad accident. No one really knows what will happen to the airport. If they do expand it, it could turn into an airport like Heathrow.
